    • resourceHandler

      static void resourceHandler​(java.util.HashMap<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> deposit, javafx.scene.control.Label coin_label, javafx.scene.control.Label servant_label, javafx.scene.control.Label shield_label, javafx.scene.control.Label stone_label)

      Parameters:
      deposit - Hashmap of Resources -> amount to be displayed
      coin_label - text label associated with coin Resource
      servant_label - text label associated with servant Resource
      shield_label - text label associated with shield Resource
      stone_label - text label associated with stone Resource

    • loadDepositLevels

      static void loadDepositLevels​(java.lang.Boolean[] depositLevel, java.util.HashMap<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> deposit, javafx.scene.layout.GridPane deposit_grid, javafx.scene.image.ImageView[][] resourceMatrix)
      Loads and sets Deposit Level and calls loadDepositMatric
      Parameters:
      depositLevel - Array of 3 Booleans that indicates the utilization of various deposit shelfs.
      deposit - HashMap of Resource -> amount
      deposit_grid - GridPane to draw Resource images on top of Deposit shelfs.
      resourceMatrix - Matrix of ImageView

    • loadDepositMatrix

      private static void loadDepositMatrix​(Resource resource, javafx.scene.image.ImageView[][] resourceMatrix, int row, int startingColumn, int nResources, javafx.scene.layout.GridPane gridPane)
      Loads resources to Deposit GridPane
      Parameters:
      resource - Resource to be displayed on GridPane
      resourceMatrix - Matrix of ImageViews
      row - index of matrix
      startingColumn - index of matrix
      nResources - amount of {@param resource} to be drawn
      gridPane - target GridPane on which to draw the resources

    • getCardLeaderType

      static java.lang.Integer getCardLeaderType​(CardLeader cardLeader)
      Gets corresponding number depending on Card Leader Type
      Parameters:
      cardLeader - CardLeader whose corresponding type index type is of interest.
      Returns:
      Based on {@param cardLeader}'s type : 1 if Discount, 2 if Deposit, 3 if WhiteMarble, 4 if Production.

    • getCardLeaderColor

      static java.lang.Integer getCardLeaderColor​(CardLeader cardLeader)
      Gets corresponding number depending on Card Leader Color
      Parameters:
      cardLeader - CardLeader whose corresponding color index type is of interest.
      Returns:
      Based on {@param cardLeader}'s Resource it uses : 0 if Coins, 1 if Servants, 2 if Shields, 3 if Stones.
